snippet: This week, Makoto Azuma’s Exobiotanica project sent a bonsai tree and a floral arrangement into the stratosphere — and T has the photographic evidence.
abstract: This week, Makoto Azuma’s Exobiotanica project sent a bonsai tree and a floral arrangement into the stratosphere — and T has the photographic evidence.

headline.main: A Japanese Artist Launches Plants Into Space
headline.print_headline: Art Matters: Space Is the Place
